doc.after: In Germany the Scottish German John Henry McKay became the most important propagandist for individualist anarchist ideas He fused Stirnerist egoism with the positions of Benjamin Tucker and actually translated Tucker into German Two semi fictional writings of his own Die Anarchisten and Der Freiheitsucher contributed to individualist theory through an updating of egoist themes within a consideration of the anarchist movement English translations of these works arrived in the United Kingdom and in individualist American circles led by Tucker 237 McKay is also known as an important European early activist for Gay rights
